articles.title: COVID-19 live updates: Total number of cases passes 106 million - Medical News Today
articles.description: This live article covers developments regarding SARS-CoV-2 and COVID-19. We will update it regularly as the pandemic continues.
articles.content:
• The coronavirus outbreak began in Wuhan, China, in December 2019.
